Detailed Description

Interface to collision checking in planning scene as an OMPL State Validity Checker.

The class is explicitly called collision checker because that is it's only responsibility. In the existing OMPL interface in MoveIt, the state validity checker has two extra responsibilities:

  • Check path constraints -> this is now part of the OMPL state space
  • Check joint limits? -> these are now bounds on the OMPL state space ( although the latter is not correctly implemented yet... )
